CodeGen.SQLStatement: Select Count(hec_act_plannedactions.HEC_ACT_PlannedActionID) as NumberOfActions From hec_act_plannedactions Inner Join hec_act_plannedaction_2_actiontype On hec_act_plannedactions.HEC_ACT_PlannedActionID = hec_act_plannedaction_2_actiontype.HEC_ACT_PlannedAction_RefID and hec_act_plannedaction_2_actiontype.IsDeleted=0 and hec_act_plannedaction_2_actiontype.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID Inner Join hec_act_actiontype On hec_act_plannedaction_2_actiontype.HEC_ACT_ActionType_RefID = hec_act_actiontype.HEC_ACT_ActionTypeID And hec_act_actiontype.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And hec_act_actiontype.IsDeleted = 0 And hec_act_actiontype.GlobalPropertyMatchingID = @typeOfAction Where hec_act_plannedactions.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID and hec_act_plannedactions.IsDeleted=0 And hec_act_plannedactions.IsCancelled = 0 And hec_act_plannedactions.ToBePerformedBy_BusinessParticipant_RefID != x'00000000000000000000000000000000'
